revised_title: The Occurrence of Aluminium in Certain Vascular Cryptogams
tldr: The author examines the presence of alumina in the ashes of certain vascular cryptogams, specifically Lycopodium and Selaginella species. They find that alumina is present in notable amounts in some Lycopodium species but not in Selaginella. The author also investigates the presence of alumina in other related plants, such as tree-ferns, and finds traces of alumina in some species.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Biology
